Text:
Despite being fullscreen, this release is great. Definitely the best release of Harsh Times to date. Picture quality is very good at 512x384 and audio sounds good as well.

For screenshots and nfo: http://www.hypoh.com/movies/dvdscr/harshtimesfsdvdscrxvid-xv

If you worry this might be a mindless action-flick that got good ratings from a bunch of brainless teenagers, you are in for a surprise.

It has 7.4 on imdb right now and i think it will get even better.

I personally would give it a 8.5 or 9.
